14734     else if (theMessage.m_strCommand.Compare("getOutbox"))
14735     {
14736         OTLog::vOutput(0, "\n==> Received a getOutbox message.  Acct: %s Nym: %s  ...\n",
14737                        theMessage.m_strAcctID.Get(), strMsgNymID.Get());
14738 
14739         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14740         OT_ENFORCE_PERMISSION_MSG(__cmd_get_outbox);
14741         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14742 
14743         UserCmdGetOutbox(*pNym, theMessage, msgOut);
14744 
14745         return true;
14746     }
14747     else if (theMessage.m_strCommand.Compare("getAccount"))
14748     {
14749         OTLog::vOutput(0, "\n==> Received a getAccount message.  Acct: %s Nym: %s  ...\n",
14750                        theMessage.m_strAcctID.Get(), strMsgNymID.Get());
14751 
14752         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14753         OT_ENFORCE_PERMISSION_MSG(__cmd_get_acct);
14754         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14755 
14756         UserCmdGetAccount(*pNym, theMessage, msgOut);
14757 
14758         return true;
14759     }
14760     else if (theMessage.m_strCommand.Compare("getAccountFiles"))
14761     {
14762         OTLog::vOutput(0, "\n==> Received a getAccountFiles message.  Acct: %s Nym: %s  ...\n",
14763                        theMessage.m_strAcctID.Get(), strMsgNymID.Get());
14764 
14765         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14766         OT_ENFORCE_PERMISSION_MSG(__cmd_get_inbox);
14767         OT_ENFORCE_PERMISSION_MSG(__cmd_get_outbox);
14768         OT_ENFORCE_PERMISSION_MSG(__cmd_get_acct);
14769         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14770 
14771         UserCmdGetAccountFiles(*pNym, theMessage, msgOut);
14772 
14773         return true;
14774     }
14775     else if (theMessage.m_strCommand.Compare("processNymbox"))
14776     {
14777         OTLog::vOutput(0, "\n==> Received a processNymbox message. Nym: %s ...\n", strMsgNymID.Get());
14778 
14779         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14780         OT_ENFORCE_PERMISSION_MSG(__cmd_process_nymbox);
14781         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14782 
14783         UserCmdProcessNymbox(*pNym, theMessage, msgOut);
14784 
14785         return true;
14786     }
14787     else if (theMessage.m_strCommand.Compare("processInbox"))
14788     {
14789         OTLog::vOutput(0, "\n==> Received a processInbox message. Acct: %s Nym: %s  ...\n",
14790                        theMessage.m_strAcctID.Get(), strMsgNymID.Get());
14791 
14792         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14793         OT_ENFORCE_PERMISSION_MSG(__cmd_process_inbox);
14794         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14795 
14796         UserCmdProcessInbox(*pNym, theMessage, msgOut);
14797 
14798         return true;
14799     }
14800     else if (theMessage.m_strCommand.Compare("queryAssetTypes"))
14801     {
14802         OTLog::vOutput(0, "\n==> Received a queryAssetTypes message. Nym: %s ...\n", strMsgNymID.Get());
14803 
14804         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14805         OT_ENFORCE_PERMISSION_MSG(__cmd_get_contract);
14806         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14807 
14808         UserCmdQueryAssetTypes(*pNym, theMessage, msgOut);
14809 
14810         return true;
14811     }
14812     else if (theMessage.m_strCommand.Compare("getContract"))
14813     {
14814         OTLog::vOutput(0, "\n==> Received a getContract message. Nym: %s ...\n", strMsgNymID.Get());
14815 
14816         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14817         OT_ENFORCE_PERMISSION_MSG(__cmd_get_contract);
14818         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14819 
14820         UserCmdGetContract(*pNym, theMessage, msgOut);
14821 
14822         return true;
14823     }
14824     else if (theMessage.m_strCommand.Compare("getMint"))
14825     {
14826         OTLog::vOutput(0, "\n==> Received a getMint message. Nym: %s ...\n", strMsgNymID.Get());
14827 
14828         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14829         OT_ENFORCE_PERMISSION_MSG(__cmd_get_mint);
14830         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14831 
14832         UserCmdGetMint(*pNym, theMessage, msgOut);
14833 
14834         return true;
14835     }
14836     else if (theMessage.m_strCommand.Compare("getMarketList"))
14837     {
14838         OTLog::vOutput(0, "\n==> Received a getMarketList message. Nym: %s ...\n", strMsgNymID.Get());
14839 
14840         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14841         OT_ENFORCE_PERMISSION_MSG(__cmd_get_market_list);
14842         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14843 
14844         UserCmdGetMarketList(*pNym, theMessage, msgOut);
14845 
14846         return true;
14847     }
14848     else if (theMessage.m_strCommand.Compare("getMarketOffers"))
14849     {
14850         OTLog::vOutput(0, "\n==> Received a getMarketOffers message. Nym: %s ...\n", strMsgNymID.Get());
14851 
14852         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14853         OT_ENFORCE_PERMISSION_MSG(__cmd_get_market_offers);
14854         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14855 
14856         UserCmdGetMarketOffers(*pNym, theMessage, msgOut);
14857 
14858         return true;
14859     }
14860     else if (theMessage.m_strCommand.Compare("getMarketRecentTrades"))
14861     {
14862         OTLog::vOutput(0, "\n==> Received a getMarketRecentTrades message. Nym: %s ...\n", strMsgNymID.Get());
14863 
14864         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14865         OT_ENFORCE_PERMISSION_MSG(__cmd_get_market_recent_trades);
14866         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14867 
14868         UserCmdGetMarketRecentTrades(*pNym, theMessage, msgOut);
14869 
14870         return true;
14871     }
14872     else if (theMessage.m_strCommand.Compare("getNym_MarketOffers"))
14873     {
14874         OTLog::vOutput(0, "\n==> Received a getNym_MarketOffers message. Nym: %s ...\n", strMsgNymID.Get());
14875 
14876         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14877         OT_ENFORCE_PERMISSION_MSG(__cmd_get_nym_market_offers);
14878         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14879 
14880         UserCmdGetNym_MarketOffers(*pNym, theMessage, msgOut);
14881 
14882         return true;
14883     }
14884     else if (theMessage.m_strCommand.Compare("triggerClause"))
14885     {
14886         OTLog::vOutput(0, "\n==> Received a triggerClause message. Nym: %s ...\n", strMsgNymID.Get());
14887 
14888         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14889         OT_ENFORCE_PERMISSION_MSG(__cmd_trigger_clause);
14890         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14891 
14892         UserCmdTriggerClause(*pNym, theMessage, msgOut);
14893 
14894         return true;
14895     }
14896     else if (theMessage.m_strCommand.Compare("usageCredits"))
14897     {
14898         OTLog::vOutput(0, "\n==> Received a usageCredits message. Nym: %s ...\n", strMsgNymID.Get());
14899 
14900         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14901         OT_ENFORCE_PERMISSION_MSG(__cmd_usage_credits);
14902         // ------------------------------------------------------------
14903 
14904         UserCmdUsageCredits(*pNym, theMessage, msgOut);
14905 
14906         return true;
14907     }
14908     else
14909     {
14910         OTLog::vError("Unknown command type in the XML, or missing payload, in ProcessMessage.\n");
14911         // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14912 
14913         OTString strTemp;
14914         strTemp.Format("@%s", theMessage.m_strCommand.Get()); // Todo security. Review this.
14915 
14916         msgOut.m_strCommand   = strTemp;
14917         msgOut.m_strAcctID    = theMessage.m_strAcctID;
14918         msgOut.m_strServerID  = theMessage.m_strServerID;
14919         msgOut.m_strNymID     = theMessage.m_strNymID;
14920 
14921         msgOut.m_bSuccess = false;
14922 
14923         OTString strRef(theMessage);
14924 
14925         msgOut.m_ascInReferenceTo.SetString(strRef);
14926 
14927         msgOut.SignContract(m_nymServer);
14928         msgOut.SaveContract();
14929 
14930         // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14931         return false;
14932     }
14933 }
14934 
14935 
14936 
14937 
14938 
14939 bool OTServer::GetConnectInfo(OTString & strHostname, int32_t & nPort)
14940 {
14941     if (NULL == m_pServerContract)
14942         return false;
14943 
14944     return m_pServerContract->GetConnectInfo(strHostname, nPort);
14945 }
